Room.Name: Gravel Walkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a winding gravel walkway between a small building in the east and hedged clearing to the west.
Room.LongDescription: Brightly colored wildflowers are on both sides of the walkway, which is well tended and has been recently raked. The gravel walkway meanders through a meadow deep in the enchanted forest. To the east you see the source of the pleasant smoke you have been smelling; a small cottage with a large smokestack at its north end. At the south side of the cottage is a pond of water and a great waterwheel is on the wall of the cottage. A stream keeps the waterwheel turning slowly. Thick trees are at the back of the cottage.
